2015 Johnny Appleseed Children's Theatre auditions

Auditions for the JACT 2015 season are scheduled for Saturday, May 9, 2015.

The auditions for the two plays, The Invisible Dragon, and The Emperor's New Clothes, will be held 9am-11am.

The auditions for the musical Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs will be held 12pm-3pm.

Please fill out the form below to request an audition slot.

In addition, you can print and fill out the audition request form and bring it with you to auditions. 2015_AUDITION_APP_JACT_SHOWS.pdf

to submit resumes electronically, please email them to boxoffice@applehillplayhouse.org.
